directions: Line a baking sheet with waxed paper and set aside.
In a medium saucepan, combine sugar, milk, water and cinnamon. Heat over medium heat and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Once boiling, continue to boil for 3 minutes.
Remove from heat, stir in vanilla and pecans, making sure to coat the pecans well. Spread candied pecans out on prepared baking sheet. Using 2 forks, separate pecans and let cool.
title: Cinnamon Glazed Pecans
